I have a problem.
When I unpack the files for DVD1, the files are too large for a 8.5GB DVD.
Is there any way around this or do I have to buy a DVD with more storage capacity?
Daniel, you need liteon IHAS 124 (or higher nr) to burn XGD3 discs properly. It wont work otherwise.

Thanks for the help. I did try to use the guide before I actually asked the question but I guess I wasnt as thorough as I should have been - or simply put; I was stupid.

Anyway, thanks for pointing out what went wrong - I'm guessing by the information collected that my DVD burner, aka the one already in my laptop when I purchased it, cannot burn at the end of disks.

I'm going to check up on another DVD-burner and see how that works out.

Once again, thanks.

This is one of the least seeded games I've ever seen. I've been scavenging the darkest corners of the internet for Metal Gear Solid HD Collection in PAL-format, and this is the most seeded torrent I've found. I seriously have an average of 11 kB/s, and I've had this torrent on for 3 days straight. If you have this game, and are not seeding, please do. A lot of people are trying to get this and if I ever finish downloading it, I will literally seed this for weeks. Help your fellow gamers out. Peace
